editorialSummary.text: Innovative exercise studio with classes using Pilates reformers, chairs & overhead bungee cords.

originalText.text: I really enjoyed my first private Pilates lesson with Sandi. The studio is a warm and an encouraging environment. Looking forward to working with their team for my fitness goals. I highly recommend!

text.text: I really enjoyed my first private Pilates lesson with Sandi. The studio is a warm and an encouraging environment. Looking forward to working with their team for my fitness goals. I highly recommend!

originalText.text: This is the studio I recommend to everyone! Their instructors are amazing and it is true boutique fitness at its best. You can be at any level to benefit and enjoy this unique workout. The front desk staff is always so nice and helpful. Their covid protocols and precautions make me feel safe to work out.

text.text: This is the studio I recommend to everyone! Their instructors are amazing and it is true boutique fitness at its best. You can be at any level to benefit and enjoy this unique workout. The front desk staff is always so nice and helpful. Their covid protocols and precautions make me feel safe to work out.

originalText.text:
A wonderful studio with talented instructors. The staff members are also amazing---friendly, organized, helpful, thoughtful. Prompt, thorough responses and thoughtful follow-up to any questions.

The studio space is on the small side, but you don't need much space for Pilates. And the upside is that there are very few other people around. I've never had more than two other people working out, with one other instructor, and it's usually no one else, or one other person and their instructor. They limit their group class sizes as well. Great COVID protocols with air purifiers and thorough wipe-downs of equipment between sessions.

Kimberly, who also leads group classes, is my trainer, and she is delightful---funny, smart, and so creative. She brings something new to every session, and pays really close attention to my physical needs and goals, both immediate and long-term. I came in last summer completely new to Pilates, and felt perfectly comfortable there from the beginning. All the trainers are friendly and talented.

I highly recommend ChaiseFitness to anyone looking for an excellent workout in a studio with lots of personal attention and a warm, welcoming atmosphere.

originalText.text: I’ve truly enjoyed Chaise! The private and group classes are excellent and very challenging. All of the instructors are phenomenal and do a great job of varying exercises to keep you challenged. A wonderful, clean and friendly spot. Thank you Chaise!

text.text: I’ve truly enjoyed Chaise! The private and group classes are excellent and very challenging. All of the instructors are phenomenal and do a great job of varying exercises to keep you challenged. A wonderful, clean and friendly spot. Thank you Chaise!

originalText.text: There is no better full body workout in NYC than Chaise Fitness.  They make Pilates fun and interesting while also challenging at the same time. The owners are amazing and the staff are all warm and friendly.  Becoming  a member of the Chaise community is like joining a family!   Classes are small and they pay close attention to making sure you are doing what's best for you. Plus the on demand  class option, which is updated weekly,  lets me keep up with my workouts not only during covid but when travelling as well.  I highly recommend Chaise!
